title: The Creatures Series
description: In an alternate urban-fantasy universe, darkness ensues. Dark mage Arsene Noirmelns left her friends so she could give someone else a fresh start, but tragedy still follow them around. In a chance meeting encounter, she is given to the opportunity to mend broken wounds. All the while, they will have to deal with the evil forces that threatens to disrupt the supernatural world.Contents:Book #1 : Creatures of the NightBook #2 : Creatures of the DarkBook #3 : Creatures of the MistBook #4 : Creatures of the IceBook #5 : Creatures of the LightBook #6 : Creatures of the Flame (Preview)Buy from Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/books/d...
author: Stella Purple
